meanings.sent1: The talented redrawer recreated the artwork beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The redrawer made a new version of the map.
meanings.sent3: The redrawer joked that they were the 'master of redraws'.
meanings.sent4: She was a redrawer, turning old sketches into fresh masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The redrawer's skill was evident in every stroke of the pen.

meanings.sent1: I will redraw the diagram to make it clearer.
meanings.sent2: She likes to redraw her favorite characters in different poses.
meanings.sent3: He decided to redraw the picture but ended up making it worse.
meanings.sent4: The artist's mind was a canvas, constantly redrawing ideas.
meanings.sent5: The architect had to redraw the plans due to a mistake in the measurements.
